+ function showNotification(componentId, messagecount) { + notificationShowedTimes++; + timeout = 1700 + (messagecount * 500) + notificationShowedTimes * 200; + $('div#' + componentId).fadeTo('normal', 1.0); + setTimeout("$('div#" + componentId + "').fadeOut('normal')", timeout); + } + + + +
